title: Particle diagram after rxn - 4 CO + 3 O2 molecules

content.question: A mixture of CO(g) and O2(g) is placed in a container, as shown above. A reaction occurs, forming CO2(g). Which of the following best represents the contents of the box after the reaction has proceeded as completely as possible?

choices.label: The figure presents 4 molecules of C O 2.
The figure presents 5 molecules. There are 4 C O 2 molecules and one O 2 molecule.
The figure shows 6 molecules. There are 2 C O 2 molecules and 4 O 2 molecules.
The figure shows 7 C O 2 molecules.

content.answer: The figure presents 5 molecules. There are 4 C O 2 molecules and one O 2 molecule.

skill.text: 3.B: Represent chemical substances or phenomena with appropriate diagrams or models (e.g., electron configuration).
